ABOUT_TEXT: sBotics is a simulation platform designed to emulate various world-famous robotics competitions, where kits are commonly used to perform the required actions. This platform offers an alternative for those seeking to test and improve their skills in the field as well as being able to test programs without the risk of damaging physical parts.
GOOGLE_PHOTO: Publicly available on Google Street View
WELCOME_MESSAGE: Start developing in the programming area.
TUTORIAL_MESSAGE:
Use the mouse buttons or the 
indicated keys to control the camera
TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: Questions while using the simulator? Click on the book icon at any time.
POSITIONING_TEXT: Use ↑, W, ↓, S, A, ←, D e → to move the robot in different directions. Use Z, X, C, V e B to move the actuator in different directions. Positioning speed:
IMPORTED_FILE_MESSAGE: The file {0} was imported. All saved changes in file will be automatically loaded in program {1}.
LOGIN_ERROR_429: Você excedeu o limite de tentativas. Wait a while try again later.
ROUTINE_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: To view the report, it's necessary to run your code at least once.​
PERFORM_SCAN: Press shift to perform the scan
CBOTICS_TOS:
This is the cBotics competition module.

To continue, please make sure you are participating in an active cBotics competition and have a generated a participation code, as well as making sure you have saved, compiled and tested your program as many times as you think is necessary before participating.

By continuing you agree to the terms of the competition in which you entered.

Good competition!
TUTORIAL_ARENA_MARKERS: Right-click on the field to add an object; Click on an object to edit its position, press the button again to confirm the new position or click with the left mouse button to delete it.
NO_ATTEMPTS_LEFT: Your attempts for this course section are over, would you like to proceed to the next checkpoint or keep trying without scoring any additional points?
NO_ATTEMPTS_LEFT_END: Your attempts for this course section are over, would you like to finish or keep trying without scoring any additional points?

CHANGED_ROBOT: Warning! Your robot has been changed and you may need to modify your code.
ARENA_REQUIRES_CHECKPOINTS: This arena requires checkpoints. Add them before running your code.
BLOCKEDUC_DISCLAIMER: To program in BlockEduc click on the "Start programming" button and the blockeduc editor will open on your computer. You will need to compile your program before testing.
CURSOR_TUTORIAL: Use W, S, A, D, Z and X to move the tile cursor (P to reset).
POSITIONING_TIP: Reliability of readings are compromised if the camera is too far.
LINES_DISCLAIMER: We were not able to find a route for the end tile. Thus, the option "Robot has to follow line" is disabled and many rescue line features wont work properly. If you want to re-enable it, reorganize the arena until this message disappears. If what you're building is not a standard Rescue Line arena, uncheck this option in the Advanced settings.
TILE_PROPERTIES_TIP: Some properties may only apply to certain types of tiles.
BLOCKEDUC_NOT_FOUND: BlockEduc app not found, make sure you have the latest sBotics version installed
BLOCKEDUC_CHECK_DUPLICATES: Check whether or not you already have BlockEduc open on your computer.
BLOCKEDUC_EXTRACTION_ERROR: BlockEduc couldn't be extracted for block programming. Opening the directory for manual extraction (do not delete any files, just unzip the zip file).
UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error has occurred. Try again.
CHECK_CONNECTION: Check your internet connection and try again.
GENERIC_ERROR: Your code has an error. Suggestion: check for the usage of prohibited characters.
FILE_EMPTY: The file cannot be empty. Write something before saving and try again.
UNABLE_TO_COMPILE: We were unable to compile your code. Try again or contact us for further help.
SOMETHING_WRONG: There's something wrong with your code. Tip: Try verifying the usage of functions with inadequate returns or innapropriate structures.
KEYWORD_VIOLATION: Error: use of the "{0}" reserved word. Tip: perform a check on the names of variables and tasks.
PERCEIVED_LIGHT: Perceived light values from light sensors:
PERCEIVED_COLOR_VALUES: Perceived color values from color sensors:
PERCEIVED_VICTIM: Presence of victim in the actuator:
CBOTICS_ERROR_403: Code not found or already used. Make sure you didn't enter the wrong code.
CBOTICS_ERROR_500: Unexpected server error. Try again later.
CBOTICS_ERROR_429: You tried it too many times, try again later.
CBOTICS_ERROR_OTHER: An unexpected error has occurred. Check your internet connection and try again.
CBOTICS_ERROR_CONNECTION: We were unable to connect to our servers. Try again later.
COMPETING_NO_ADJUSTMENTS_MESSAGE: You are now competing. Good competition!
COMPETING_MESSAGE: You are now competing and have {0} to place checkpoints if necessary. Good competition!
CLIENT_ERROR:
A client-side error occured and this round was terminated prematurely!
Details:
SUBMITTING_RESULTS: Submitting your results... This may take a while.
UNABLE_TO_SEND:
We were unable to send your result to our servers :(
Would you like to try again?)
UNEXPECTED_SBOTICS_ERROR:
Unexpected sBotics error. :(
Please contact the organizers of your competition.
RESULT_SENT_SUCCESSFULLY: Your result has been sent and can be viewed on the cBotics website.
SPEED_BUMP_RESCUE_ZONE_RAMP: Rescue zone ramp with speed bump
SPEED_BUMPS_RESCUE_ZONE_RAMP: Rescue zone ramp with multiple speed bumps
GAPS_RESCUE_ZONE_RAMP: Rescue zone ramp with multiple gaps
GAP_SPEED_BUMP_RESCUE_ZONE_RAMP: Rescue zone ramp with gap and speed bump
OUTDATED_OR_NO_CONNECTION: Your sBotics client is outdated or we couldn't connect to our servers
ARENAEXPORT_FAIL: Arena couldn't be exported to directory
TUTORIAL_PREVIEW_CAMERA: Use W, S, A, D, Z and X to move the preview camera (R to reset).
TOGGLE_CAMERA_MODES: Press O to toggle between camera modes.
PROGRAM_CREATION_FAIL: Program creation failed, make sure there are no duplicate names and try again later.
EXTERNAL_EDITOR_ADVICE: This editor wasn't meant for large codes, consider switching for an external editor such as VSCode.
ALTERNATIVE_RESCUE_ZONE_ENTRANCE_SINGLE_: Alternative Rescue Zone entrance single wall
ALTERNATIVE_RESCUE_ZONE_EXIT_SINGLE_WALL: Alternative Rescue Zone exit single wall
FAIL_RELOAD: Could not reload program, try saving again to avoid problems.
CONFIRMATION_RECOVER: Are you sure you want to recover program?
COMPILE_ONCE: You have to compile your code at least once to participate in a tournament.
CBOTICS_ERROR_PERMISSION: This account does not belong to this participation code's team.
UNABLE_WHILE_COMPETING: This action is not permitted while competing.
UNABLE_WHILE_PLAYING: This action is not permitted while playing.
ALTERNATIVE_DIAGONAL_CUVE_WITH_SPEED_BUM: Alternative diagonal cuve with speed bump
UNILATERAL_90_DEGREE_ZIG_ZAG_WITH_SPEED_: Unilateral 90 degree zig zag with speed bump
NINETY_DEGREE_ZIG_ZAG_WITH_SPEED_BUMPS: Ninety degree zig zag with speed bumps
ARE_YOU_SURE_QUIT: Are you sure you want to quit sBotics?
AUXILIARY_PROGRAM_ERROR: This program is for internal/debug purposes only. Changes WON'T be saved properly.
